description.value:
Salamanders are fierce warriors and master smiths, and you wield their might and mastery of metal by birthright.

Bonus Feats:

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Zeq6RWYv5otvg8q7]{Cleave}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.ZmQkRk93nbHxsQSt]{Improved Grapple}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.cKxfEL5XOWuzLhfO]{Improved Iron Will}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{Iron Will}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.FUW5mIXHNBBIQ1Sq]{Power Attack}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{Skill Focus} (Perception),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{Toughness}

Bonus Spells:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.d0rd4z2kcln69xif]{Lead Blades} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.x23pz2agjub1eh89]{Make Whole} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vjnynvz1omleni8a]{Versatile Weapon} (13th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nfm6i9z9r3n2fku7]{Fire Shield} (warm only) (16th).
